Question: The Colts lost 19–16 to the Super Bowl bound Titans and this person was limited to one touchdown run.
Hints: This person was named AFC Offensive Player of the Week.
This person, who had been criticized for failing to win big games, exorcised his big-game demons with the win.
This person's first win came against fellow rookie quarterback Ryan Leaf, 17–12 over the Chargers.
